product.title: Cute Mini Microwave Oven Interactive 31pc Kitchen Children Toys with Light & Sound
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Ding! Your food is ready

    You and your child will be amazed by the technology behind this interactive mini microwave that has a LED display to show different cooking times depending on what they want to cook. Your child can now own the latest microwave toy!

    A unique microwave toy that can't be found down the street. This will provide your children with endless entertainment and the ultimate experience as they reheat their food and serve you 5-star dishes.

    🍔 An interactive children's microwave
    🍔 LED display to show cooking times
    🍔 Pressable buttons
    🍔 Light and sound inside the microwave whilst it is on
    🍔 The inside plate also rotates whilst the food cooks
    🍔 31 pieces of food, cutlery, and cooking essentials included
    🍔 2 x AA batteries required (not included)
     

    They won't want to stop cooking and being the chef of the house

    Your children will love their new microwave, a toy like no other that will inspire imagination and creativity. This cooker comes with plastic meat, burgers, cutlery, a chopping board, and more. Choose between two different colors.

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 3 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our interactive toys are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations with your children. As you play and interact with your child, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 3 years old

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
